# Mace, Heavy
## Overview
A heavy mace has a larger head and a longer handle than a normal mace.

|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|

| | Mace, heavy | 12 gp | 1d6 | 1d8 | x2 | — | 8 lbs. | B | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 147
